bill_title: Honoring the 2023-2024 Canton C-Hawks boys wrestling team for its outstanding accomplishments.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2023-2024 Canton C-Hawks boys wrestling team for its outstanding accomplishments. WHEREAS, the Canton C-Hawks boys wrestling team continue to dominate Class B boys wrestling; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawks boys wrestling team won the Class B team dual championship on February 10, 2024, in Watertown; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawks boys wrestling team claimed their seventh consecutive Class B individual state championship on February 24, 2024, in Sioux Falls; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawks boys wrestling team compiled a team score of 170.5 points; and WHEREAS, Carter Kendrick (106 lbs.), Ashton Keller (132 lbs.), and Ayson Rice (150 lbs.) won individual state titles for the C-Hawks: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2023-2024 Canton C-Hawks boys wrestling team performed in an outstanding manner at the 2024 state Class B boys team dual and individual wrestling tournaments.
